courses.subject: GE
courses.customDesc: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Lower-Division F, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B and Upper-Division C should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Upper-Division C cannot be fulfilled with COMS courses. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).

courses.subject: Upper-Division COMS Elective
courses.customDesc:
Any Upper-Division COMS Elective (COMS 300-400 level) course can go here.

Only 4 units of supervised instruction, including COMS400, COMS450, and COMS485, may be counted here.

Courses taken to meet the focus area cannot double count as a COMS Elective.

courses.subject: Graduation Writing Requirement
courses.customDesc: Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites.
